input_args.passage: "the Taliban | the Taliban, The battle took place between November 25 and December 1, 2001, in northern Afghanistan. It followed the intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which had been harboring al-Qaeda operatives. input_args.claim: "Further information about the battle is provided in citation, which states that the battle took place in northern Afghanistan as part of an intervention by United States-led coalition forces to overthrow the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which had been harboring al-Qaeda operatives."
